entry.title: CTV + CSFS: a letter
entry.summary: James communicated to Greg, clarifying a misunderstanding by reproducing an earlier message which highlighted the necessity of obtaining releases from each author involved in the proposal. James emphasized that there had been no response to the initial message and reassured Greg that there was no intention of blocking him. This exchange took place within the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List" group, a platform subscribed to by Greg for discussions related to Bitcoin development.
